meanings.definition: A machine used for separating particles based on their density by spinning them at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The ultracentrifuges in the lab separate different materials by spinning them quickly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ultracentrifuges to separate particles based on their weight.
meanings.sent3: The ultracentrifuges at work are like magical spinners that sort tiny things by how heavy they are.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, ultracentrifuges act as powerful sorters, spinning particles to reveal their true nature.
meanings.sent5: The ultracentrifuges hummed as they worked tirelessly to separate the particles with precision.

meanings.definition: To separate particles using an ultracentrifuge.
meanings.sent1: Researchers ultracentrifuge the samples to analyze the different components.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ultracentrifuges the mixture to extract the desired particles.
meanings.sent3: When in doubt, just ultracentrifuge the solution and see what settles at the bottom.
meanings.sent4: The scientist ultracentrifuged the liquid, watching as the particles separated like a miniature galaxy.
meanings.sent5: To understand the composition better, ultracentrifuge the sample and observe the layers forming.
